Our Mission

Built for outcomes, not engagement

Most fitness apps optimize for daily active users, not actual results. They're built to keep you engaged, not help you achieve real body composition changes.

We obsess over user outcomes. Every feature must help you lose fat, gain muscle, or understand your body better. We track body fat percentage, lean mass, and FFMIâ€”the metrics that actually matter.

DEXA-scan accuracy from your phone. Scientific precision made simple. We compete by being undeniably better, not by spending more on ads.

Professional Grade

DEXA-scan accuracy in your pocket. Body fat tracking with Â±2% precision when done right.

Visual Progress

See changes your scale can't measure. Automated photo reminders with consistent angles.

FFMI Tracking

Know your genetic potential. Track lean muscle gains without the guesswork.

Built for Results

From personal use to professional coaching. Tools that actually move the needle.

Our Values

What drives us

The principles that guide every decision we make and every feature we build.

Obsess Over User Outcomes

We measure success by users who achieve real body composition changes. Every feature must move users closer to their goals.

Be Undeniably Better

We compete by being so superior that switching feels like downgrading. Quality is our only sustainable moat.

Science Over Stories

Evidence-based decisions, not feelings. Scientific accuracy even when the truth is uncomfortable.

Eliminate Friction Ruthlessly

Complex science should feel simple. Complete body metrics in under 30 seconds, every time.

Privacy as Competitive Advantage

Your body data is deeply personal. We make privacy our differentiator through transparency and control.

Move Fast Without Breaking Users

Rapid iteration drives competitive advantage, but user trust is irreplaceable once broken.
